name: Professional Basketball
description: Official-size professional basketball with premium synthetic leather construction and deep channel design for superior grip and control. Meets NBA standards and is perfect for competitive play, training, and recreational use. Durable rubber base and precision air retention valve.
shortDescription: Official-size professional basketball with superior grip

name: NFL Football
description: Official NFL-regulation football with premium leather construction and reinforced seams. Features the iconic NFL shield and perfect spiral design for optimal flight trajectory. Great for competitive games, practice, or tailgate parties. Includes lacing options for all skill levels.
shortDescription: Official NFL-regulation football for competitive play

name: Soccer Ball Official Size
description: Official-size soccer ball (size 5) with machine-stitched 32-panel construction for consistent performance. High-quality PVC leather with cushioned foam backing provides excellent touch and durability. Perfect for training, recreational play, or competitive matches. Suitable for all ages.
shortDescription: Official-size soccer ball with machine-stitched panels

name: Volleyball Indoor/Outdoor
description: Versatile volleyball designed for both indoor and outdoor play with durable synthetic leather construction. Official regulation size and weight with reinforced stitching for long-lasting durability. Excellent ball control and responsive touch. Perfect for recreational leagues, schools, and beach tournaments.
shortDescription: Regulation volleyball for indoor and outdoor play

name: Baseball Official League
description: Official league-approved baseball with cork/rubber center and two-piece leather construction. Features the classic red stitching and meets all MLB standards for professional and amateur play. High-quality materials ensure consistent flight and durability through countless innings of play.
shortDescription: Official league-approved baseball with cork/rubber center

name: Adjustable Dumbbells Set
description: Complete adjustable dumbbell set with weights ranging from 5 lbs to 50 lbs per hand. Quick-adjust mechanism for rapid weight changes during workouts. Includes sturdy storage stand and exercise guide booklet. Perfect for home gyms, toning, strength building, and full-body workouts.
shortDescription: 5-50 lbs adjustable dumbbells with storage stand

name: Yoga Mat Premium
description: Premium non-slip yoga mat made from eco-friendly TPE material with extra cushioning for joint protection. Thickness of 6mm provides excellent support during poses while remaining portable. Features alignment marks for proper positioning. Includes carrying strap for easy transport to class or outdoor sessions.
shortDescription: 6mm premium non-slip yoga mat with alignment marks

name: Resistance Bands Set
description: Complete set of 5 color-coded resistance bands offering different resistance levels from light to heavy. Made from natural latex with reinforced stitching for durability and safety. Includes carrying bag and exercise guide with 50+ workout routines. Perfect for strength training, physical therapy, and flexibility work.
shortDescription: 5-band resistance set with exercise guide and bag

name: Kettlebell 20lb
description: Cast iron kettlebell weighing exactly 20 lbs with a smooth, comfort-grip handle for secure holding during dynamic movements. Perfect for functional fitness training, core strengthening, and full-body workouts. Durable powder-coated finish prevents rust and provides reliable performance for years.
shortDescription: 20lb cast iron kettlebell with comfort-grip handle

name: Jump Rope Speed
description: High-speed jump rope with adjustable length (up to 10 feet) suitable for all heights. Features smooth ball bearings in the handles for faster rotation and reduced entanglement. Lightweight PVC cable and ergonomic handles provide comfort during intense cardio sessions. Great for warm-up exercises and boxing training.
shortDescription: Speed jump rope with ball bearing handles, adjustable

name: 4-Person Camping Tent
description: Spacious 4-person camping tent with advanced weather protection featuring 3000mm waterproof coating and sealed seams. Easy setup dome structure with two doors for convenience. Includes vestibule areas for gear storage and excellent ventilation to prevent condensation. Great for family camping trips and outdoor adventures.
shortDescription: 4-person tent with waterproof coating and vestibules

name: Fishing Rod & Reel Combo
description: Complete fishing combo featuring a 7-foot medium-action rod paired with a smooth spinning reel. Ideal for freshwater and light saltwater fishing. Includes 200 yards of monofilament line, tackle box with assorted lures, and carrying case. Perfect for beginners and experienced anglers alike.
shortDescription: 7ft rod with spinning reel, line, lures & carrying case

name: Inflatable Kayak
description: High-quality inflatable kayak designed for two adults with drop-stitch construction for superior rigidity and durability. Features excellent stability, maneuverability, and includes two paddles, hand pump, and repair kit. Weighs only 28 lbs but can hold up to 500 lbs capacity. Perfect for lakes, rivers, and coastal exploration.
shortDescription: 2-person inflatable kayak with paddles and hand pump

name: Hiking Backpack 40L
description: Professional-grade 40-liter hiking backpack with ergonomic design and padded hip belt for weight distribution. Features weather-resistant material, multiple compartments, and compression straps for secure packing. Ventilated back panel reduces heat buildup during strenuous hikes. Perfect for day trips and multi-day expeditions.
shortDescription: 40L hiking backpack with ventilated back panel

name: Cooler 50qt
description: Heavy-duty 50-quart cooler with rotomolded construction for extreme durability and superior insulation. Keeps ice for up to 5 days in optimal conditions. Features a non-slip lid, built-in bottle opener, and seamless design that prevents leaks. Perfect for camping, tailgating, fishing trips, and outdoor gatherings.
